sentences.english: At last it is being made to pay for its past scandalous behaviour, " said Deborah Arnott, director of ASH."
sentences.chinese: 最後，它被要求爲自己過去的可恥行爲買單。

sentences.english: As long as the health care system will pay the price, the money will flow in that direction.
sentences.chinese: 只要有醫療系統來買單，錢就會滾滾而來。

sentences.english: Didier Drogba says Chelsea are paying in Europe for the Anders Frisk affair.
sentences.chinese: 德羅巴稱切爾西正在歐洲爲弗里斯克裁判事件買單。

sentences.english: No local financing for abortion services in the District of Columbia.
sentences.chinese: 地方政府也不應該爲哥倫比亞區的墜胎服務買單。

sentences.english: The downside of fiscal stimulus is that someone must pay for it.
sentences.chinese: 財政刺激方案的唯一壞處就是總得有人買單。

sentences.english: These were private banks, why should we have to pay for their mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 這些是私人銀行，我們爲什麼必須爲他們的錯誤買單？

sentences.english: In the process, you will subject yourself to any number of self-generated, costly errors.
sentences.chinese: 在這個過程中，你要爲自己製造的，昂貴的錯誤買單。

sentences.english: After the buy, and the price is up, so why single out?
sentences.chinese: 下買單之後，價位還在漲，何必出單？

sentences.english: They may to print a lot of paper to cover them.
sentences.chinese: 政府可能會大印鈔票來爲此買單。
“這個是費爾斯通爲你買單，”他說道。

sentences.english: So why ask them to pay in unborn children for our profligacy?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，爲什麼要求他們不生孩子來爲我們的揮霍買單？

sentences.english: But questions abound over who will foot the bill for the grid's modernization.
sentences.chinese: 然而，誰爲電網現代化買單是個大問題。

sentences.english: I paid for our meals together because I was so much better off.
sentences.chinese: 外出就餐總是我買單，因爲我的經濟狀況要好很多。

sentences.english: Help bag your own groceries at the checkout counter.
sentences.chinese: 在雜貨店的收銀臺買單時幫忙打包自己的東西。

definition: to fight over/to rush/to scramble/to grab/to rob/to snatch
coin/money/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/unit of weight, one tenth of a tael 兩|两[liang3]
to pay the bill (in a restaurant etc) (loanword from Cantonese)/(fig.) to bear responsibility
improbable/unlikely/will not (act, happen etc)/not able/not having learned to do sth/(coll.) (Tw) don't mention it/not at all
to help/to assist/to support/for sb (i.e. as a help)/hired (as worker)/side (of pail, boat etc)/outer layer/upper (of a shoe)/group/gang/clique/party/secret society
